translation.welcomeMessage: CONNECT YOUR WALLET AND GET STARTED!
translation.joinRewards: JOIN OUR POOL REWARDS & STAKING SYSTEM
translation.paragraphCryptocurrencies: Deposit Native Cryptocurrencies and Tokens (ERC-20) into our Pools and Generate Passive Cryptocurrency Revenue. Currently Danki Finance is a unique Brazilian Web3 platform with s elected contracts and security. And expanding internationally!
translation.paragraphWithdraw: You can withdraw or deposit any time you want to any pool you choose to participate. Some pools have a fee to enter, others don't. Consult Pool details before Depositing.
translation.contractsPools: All our contracts (pools, games and more) are audited and secure. Invest safely.
translation.openYourMind: OPEN YOUR MIND TO THE FUTURE
